company_context: #1 Global Sales Enablement Platform | Seismic Search EN Login Connect With Us Connect With Us Explore the Seismic Enablement Cloud™ Get a Demo Watch Demo Videos Talk with your AI Agent Trusted by approximately 2,000 organizations worldwide HubSpot $18M annual efficiency savings from increased rep productivity Onesource Virtual 34% increase in average deal size Aerogen 56% reduction in sales cycle length IBM 20% faster growth rate Salesloft 52% shorter deal cycles, on average AllianceBernstein $1.8M in efficiency savings Oracle 34,000+ content shares through Seismic LiveSend LGIM 10K hours saved annually across the sales force Experian 10% increase in deal size Ameriprise Financial 70% reduction in administrative tasks Advantive 50% decrease in sales cycle length Ultimo 15% increase in customer engagement Illumina 6x increase in content usage SpyCloud 3X What is Seismic? Meet the Seismic Enablement Cloud, the only unified AI-powered revenue enablement platform that gives revenue leaders the confidence that their teams are ready to reach their goals – and the insights and tools to empower them to pivot quickly if they’re not. Explore the Seismic Enablement Cloud TM What can Seismic’s enablement software do for your team? For revenue teams Seismic gives revenue leaders the confidence to know their teams are ready to maximize every customer interaction — and provides the insights and tools to pivot quickly if they’re not. It drives productivity, scales best practices, and helps go-to-market teams reduce costs and grow revenue . Learn More For customer-facing teams Seismic prepares customer-facing teams with the skills, content, tools, and insights they need to maximize every buyer interaction and strengthen client relationships . With AI-driven insights and feedback to assess performance, managers identify winning behaviors, uncover skill gaps, and provide targeted coaching that drives continuous improvement for their go-to-market teams. Learn More For enablement teams Seismic provides enablement teams with a structured way to design enablement programs that drive your business’s strategic objectives. It empowers them to understand their impact, so field teams are ready, behavior change sticks, and every initiative drives measurable business outcomes. Learn More For marketing teams Seismic empowers marketers to influence buyer experience and pipeline growth by delivering the right content to customer-facing teams. With AI-powered automation and real-time insights, they can streamline personalization, refine messaging, and drive sales and marketing team alignment and impact at scale. Learn More The revenue enablement platform that high-performing teams trust to deliver results See how Lumen transformed its growth trajectory by partnering with Seismic to improve seller performance — giving their teams the clarity, insights, and AI-powered digital sales tools to engage customers more impactfully and drive outcomes that matter. Ashley Haynes-Gaspar CRO a

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a leading provider of data processing solutions, and I came across your company while researching innovative businesses in the industry. Can I have a few minutes of your time to discuss how our solution can help optimize your data management?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Okay, I'm listening. But make it quick. I'm busy with our current implementation of Seismic's enablement platform, and I'm not sure we're in the market for another data solution right now.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I understand. Seismic is a great platform, but our solution can actually complement it by providing more in-depth data analysis and processing capabilities. We've had success with similar companies in the past, helping them reduce costs and increase revenue. Would you like to hear more about how we can help?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) I'm not sure. We just signed a three-year contract with Oracle for their data processing services, and I'm not keen on adding another vendor to our stack. Plus, I'm concerned about the integration costs and potential disruptions to our current workflows.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about vendor management and integration. However, our solution is designed to be highly adaptable and can integrate seamlessly with existing systems, including Seismic and Oracle. We've also had clients who have seen significant ROI from our solution, even with existing contracts in place. Perhaps we could discuss potential ROI and see if it's worth exploring further?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (firmly) I appreciate the offer, but I'm afraid we're locked into this contract for the next two years, and our procurement team is not receptive to new vendor additions at this time. Additionally, our IT department is already stretched thin with the current implementation, so I don't think we could handle another integration project.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand the challenges you're facing, and I respect your commitment to your current contract. However, I'd like to propose a pilot project that could demonstrate the value of our solution without requiring a full-scale implementation. This way, you could assess the benefits and potential ROI without disrupting your current workflows.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (definitively) Alex, I appreciate your persistence, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. Our priorities are focused on getting the most out of our existing contracts and investments, and I don't see us making any changes to our data processing infrastructure in the near future. Thank you for reaching out, but I think it's best we focus on our current partnerships.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly assessed the buyer's current priorities and contract commitments earlier in the conversation to avoid investing time in a pitch that was unlikely to succeed. Sentiment: Neutral
